column2: title=The Unacknowledged Legislators: Ausgewählte Aufsätze zur englischen Literatur

column1: '''The Unacknowledged Legislators: Ausgewählte Aufsätze zur englischen Literatur''' (''...: Selected essays on English literature'') is a German-language book, in the series ''Schweizer anglistische Arbeiten'', 98th volume. The author writes about [[wikipedia:William Shakespeare
column5: D.H. Lawrence]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>[http://www.buchfreund.de/productListing.php?used=1&productId=34495221 ''Buchfreund''], as of April 21, 2010.</ref>

column1: ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is discussed in the essay "The Lord of the Rings: Aktualisierung einer untergehenden Welt" ("The Actualization of a Vanished World"), pp. 202-231.<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam
column2: Bertenstam, Åke]]: ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]''</ref>
